Archive.Title: Profile Visualizer
Archive.Description: A more effective way to view user information through graphs and statistics. Here, you can access all relevant details about GitHub users with ease.

Archive.Title: IMDb
Archive.Description: An app created in my free time with the aim of being a front-end-only application powered by data from TheMovieDB. It was designed to be a user-friendly platform where you can effortlessly search for movie and series information.

Archive.Title: Accounting app
Archive.Description: Frontend interface for an accounting app. The objective here was to create a responsive design that renders the content of each section on the same page.

Archive.Title: Maciel Eletricista
Archive.Description: Dynamic landing page featuring a range of interactive elements and visually appealing design for an enjoyable end-user experience.

Archive.Title: LoL Auth
Archive.Description: Frontend and Backend login system based on the League of Legends client login theme, created during my free time to enhance my skills with React.

Archive.Title: Reminders
Archive.Description: A practical note-taking app inspired by Google Keep that helps you keep your tasks and appointments organized.

Archive.Title: Reminders API
Archive.Description: Reminders API is a backend server designed specifically for the Reminders application. It handles the storage and retrieval of data, utilizing the MongoDB database hosted on Atlas. It seamlessly integrates with the frontend application, enabling users to create, update, and retrieve their data effortlessly.

Archive.Title: E-mail Marketing
Archive.Description: This is a application that receives user data and saves it directly to a Mailchimp database, aiming to simplify and streamline the process of creating and sending email marketing campaigns.

Archive.Title: Portfolio - v1
Archive.Description: My portfolio is a platform designed to facilitate communication and showcase my projects. Inspired by Brittany Chiang's design, it was completely written and developed by me. It aims to provide a clear and engaging overview of my work, skills, and experiences.

Archive.Title: LandingPage
Archive.Description: This project consists of a Landing Page created using only HTML and CSS, with 6 sections, an animated menu, and fully responsive design.

Archive.Title: TinDog
Archive.Description: In this project, the goal is to create a landing page using the Bootstrap framework that will showcase the mobile app 'TinDog, a 'Tinder' designed specifically for dogs.

Archive.Title: E-commerce
Archive.Description: This project is an e-commerce website built using Django, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python. The website allows users to browse products, add them to their cart, and complete a checkout process. The project also includes an admin panel for managing products, orders, and users.

Archive.Title: Simon-Game
Archive.Description: Every time you successfully reproduce the sequence, the game will become more challenging, adding more elements to the sequence. But be careful, if you make a mistake, the game will end and you will have to start over.

Archive.Title: Drum
Archive.Description: Drum is a simple virtual drum app built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. With seven different pieces to choose from, including bass drum, snare drum, hi-hat, tom, cymbal, floor tom, and cowbell, you can play the drums using your keyboard or mouse.

Archive.Title: Calculator
Archive.Description: Designed to handle complex mathematical functions with ease, making it the perfect tool for students.

Archive.Title: SplashScreen
Archive.Description: This Circular Splash Screen is designed to check the existence of certain files and create them if they don't exist to ensure proper system functionality. During the verification process, a circular animation will spin on the screen to indicate that the system is being checked and to keep users informed of the verification progress.

Archive.Title: EasySchedule
Archive.Description: EasySchedule is a user-friendly scheduling application designed to simplify the process of managing appointments and tasks. With a clean and intuitive interface, it allows users to easily create, organize, and track their schedules.
